lang.author: Maplespe
lang.inituifail0: MiaoUI library Initialization failed! error code:
lang.initfail0: Note that because DWM is running in a sandbox, this application must be placed in a non-user directory, and the path cannot be in "{path}" or its sub directories! Please place it in another directory.
lang.symloadfail: Loading symbol files failed! The program could not load the DLL, please download the symbols again. (Symbols may also need to be re-downloaded after a system update)
lang.installsucs1: Installed successfully! But you haven't downloaded valid symbol files yet, download it from the "Symbols" page to make DWMBlurGlass work.
lang.loadfail: Failed to load component! Error message:
lang.methodcustom:
[Recommended] Custom blur implementation written by CVisual (DWM)
and Windows.UI.Composition (dcomp) to achieve custom backdrop effects, 
you can customize most of the parameters. Not only you can get the highest 
efficiency, but also the best appearance and better stability. However, the 
compatibility is not that good. 
It may be broken after a major Windows update, then you have to wait for 
the next release.
lang.methodaccent:
[Not Recommended] Use DWM internal 
AccentBlurBehind class to apply blur effect. You can customize some of the 
parameters, but it is inefficient and less stable. It can work normally on most 
systems. 
(generally, a system update will not break it).
lang.methoddwmapi:
Use documented DWMAPI in Windows 11 to apply limited SystemBackdrop effect, such as 
Acrylic and Mica effect, you cannot customize these parameters at all, but it has 
high efficiency and better stability. However, it may break the appearance of 
some programs, and it is only available on Windows 11 22H2 and newer.
lang.symtip:
Symbol files (pdb) are files that record debugging information about a
program. Since systems vary from version to version, you need to
download symbol files from the Microsoft servers. If you update your
system, you may need to download the symbol files again.
lang.symdownfail: Download failed! Unable to download symbol files from "msdl.microsoft.com".
lang.syminvalid: Symbol files are invalid, please go to the "Symbols" page of the DWMBlurGlass program to download new symbol files.
lang.importwarn: Importing a configuration file will overwrite your existing configuration, continue anyway?
lang.restorecfg: Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration?
